summary: AN ORDINANCE granting to the Lamda Association of Gamma Phi Beta, a Washington nonprofit corporation, a renewable ten-year permit to construct, maintain and operate a pedestrian skybridge across the alley between 16th Ave. N.E. and 17th Ave. N.E. approximately 325 feet (98.6 meters) north of N.E. 45th St., specifying the conditions and providing for acceptance.
